description: Create a job production plan project phase revenue item.
permissions: Requires permission to create job production plan project phase revenue items for the related job production plan; access is delegated to the associated job production plan policy.
side_effects: Creates a job production plan project phase revenue item and triggers post-commit work that updates related project phase cost item actuals, caches cost-code matches, and generates a job production plan recap asynchronously.
validation_notes: --job-production-plan and --project-phase-revenue-item are required. Job production plan and project phase revenue item must belong to the same project. Quantity must be a number greater than or equal to 0 when provided. Project phase revenue item must be unique per job production plan.

flags.name: --project-phase-revenue-item
flags.description: Project phase revenue item ID (required). Example: 456.

flags.name: --quantity
flags.validation: Must be a number greater than or equal to 0 when provided.
